participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing, creative, and passionate about the arts.
participant_1.background: I am a student at Michigan State University. I work at a coffee house. I have a cat named Seven of Nine. I like to sing Broadway show tunes.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Organized, friendly, and has a curious nature towards the supernatural.
participant_2.background: I am a wedding planner. My favorite color is yellow. I am fascinated with ghosts. When I was a child, I wanted to be an architect.

content.text: Hi, what do you do for fun?
I like to plan weddings and I'm fascinated by ghosts.
That's cool. I'm a student at Michigan State University and I work at a coffee house. I also like to sing broadway show tunes.
Do you have any favorite show tunes?
I do! I love "The Phantom of the Opera" and "Les Miserables."
Those are great shows! I've seen both of them.
What did you think of them?
I thought they were both amazing. The music was incredible and the stories were really engaging.
I agree! They're both some of my favorite musicals.
Do you have any plans for after you graduate?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going to grad school, but I'm not sure what I want to study.
That's a big decision. I'm sure you'll figure it out.
Thanks, I hope so.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to sing, I love broadway show tunes, and I also like to write.
That's cool. I like to read and I also like to go on trips.
What's your favorite book?
I don't have a favorite book, but I like reading books about history.
That's cool. I like to read books about psychology.
That's interesting. I've never read a book about psychology before.
You should! They're really interesting.
Maybe I will
